thread.title: Chris Bosh to Join TNT as NBA Studio Analyst
thread.title_full: Chris Bosh to Join TNT as NBA Studio Analyst

author: Adam Wells
title: Chris Bosh to Join TNT as NBA Studio Analyst
text: Chris Bosh to Join TNT as NBA Studio Analyst Wilfredo Lee/Associated Press Adam Wells Featured Columnist February 23, 2017 While Chris Bosh continues to seek a return to the court, the 11-time All-Star will also offer his expertise as a studio analyst for TNT's NBA coverage. The NBA on TNT welcomed Bosh to the team on Twitter . According to Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel , the studio analyst stint will last five weeks and coincides with the "likely timing of [the] Heat attempting to shed [Bosh's] cap hit." More to follow.
